text: The 1971 San Fernando earthquake (also known as the Sylmar earthquake) happened in the early morning of February 9 in the San Gabriel Mountains. It was at the northern edge of the San Fernando Valley in southern California. The quake measured 6.6 on the Richter scale. The damage was severe near the San Fernando Valley. The quake happened at 6am Pacific Standard Time. Sixty- four people were killed by the earthquake. San Fernando earthquake Category:1970s in California Category:Earthquakes in California Category:Los Angeles County, California
title: 1971 San Fernando earthquake
